EmailTemplate.name: Americana-EmailTemplate-UserCredentialsNotification
EmailTemplate.Body:
Congratulations! Your team member $!idname's $!application Application's Account has been successfully created.


Please find below the details for the user.

  • Username : $!username
  • Password : $!password


If you have any queries, please reach out at IAMsuppport@Americana-food.com


Best Regards,
Your's Americana IT Helpdesk.
EmailTemplate.Description: Email template used to notify user with his Active Directory Credentials

Argument.name: idname
Argument.Description: The ID Name that new account is created for.

EmailTemplate.Subject: New Account Credentials For : $!idname
